metadata.title: CVE-2020-15251 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Channelmgnt plug-in for Sopel (a Python IRC bot) before version1.0.3, malicious users are able to op/voice and take over a channel. Thisis an ACL bypass vulnerability. This plugin is bundled withMirahezeBot-Plugins with versions from 9.0.0 and less than 9.0.2 affected.Version 9.0.2 includes 1.0.3 of channelmgnt, and thus is safe from thisvulnerability. See referenced GHSA-23pc-4339-95vg.

criterions.comment: sopel: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
